TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartChrome extends System.Object

summary.span: 讓開發人員僅覆寫 區域中 或伺服器控制項之選取區段的呈現。

span.span: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of or server controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個框架周邊的使用者介面 (UI) 項目是指 web 組件 chrome控制項或伺服器控制項中包含區域。Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each control or server control contained in a zone. 控制項的色彩範圍會包括框線、 標題列、 圖示、 標題文字和標題列中出現的動詞命令功能表。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. 色彩的外觀設定區域層級，並套用至區域中的所有伺服器控制項。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the server controls in the zone. Web 組件控制項集合使用類別轉譯的色彩範圍控制項。The Web Parts control set uses the class to render the chrome for controls. 此外，這個類別會提供方法，讓開發人員在自訂的 （例如頁首或頁尾） 的任何個別區段轉譯控制項而不必處理這些控制項的所有呈現的區域。Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any individual section (such as the header or footer) of the controls in a zone without having to handle all the rendering for those controls. 例如，您可以覆寫方法，以自訂一些特定的樣式屬性套用至區域，但是您可以依賴處理其餘的預設轉譯。For example, you can override the method to customize some specific style attributes applied to the zone, but you can rely on the default rendering to handle the rest. 類別包含數個重要的方法，當您想要覆寫的轉譯方式會很有用控制項。The class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of controls. 其中一個是方法，可讓您變更的樣式屬性物件相關聯用來呈現控制項的物件。One is the method, which enables you to change the style attributes of the object associated with the object used to render a control. 另一個是建構函式，當您覆寫時，您使用中自訂方法類別來建立自訂的執行個體物件。Another is the constructor, which you use when you override the method in a custom class to create an instance of your custom object. 另一個有用的方法是方法，可用來控制內容區域的區域 （而不是 chrome 元素，例如頁首、 頁尾和標題列） 中的控制項的轉譯。Another useful method is the method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars). 方法可讓您排除某些動詞呈現，如果不想讓使用者看到這些動詞命令，在 UI 中的某些原因。The method enables you to exclude certain verbs from being rendered, if for some reason you do not want users to see those verbs in the UI. 最後，如果您想要完整控制以程式設計方式呈現的所有層面控制項，您可以覆寫方法。Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the controls, you can override the method. 有幾項屬性類別也很有用。Several properties of the class are also useful. 和屬性會提供參考相關聯的區域物件和目前分別執行個體。The and properties provide references to the zone associated with the object and the current instance, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，以覆寫預設呈現控制項區域。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to override the default rendering of controls in a zone. 程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 在範例中的所有控制項都裝載的網頁。A Web page that hosts all the controls in the example. - 包含自訂的程式碼的類別區域和類別。A class that contains the source code for a custom zone and a class. - 此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control. 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 對於程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要取得的使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在.aspx 頁面，在此程式碼範例中的相同資料夾中的檔案。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 此範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the example is the Web page. 請注意，沒有`Register`指示詞檔案以登錄編譯過的元件與標記首碼頂端附近。Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the file to register the compiled component and a tag prefix. 另外請注意頁面參考的項目自訂區域``並包含在區域內數個標準 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項。Also note that the page references the custom zone using the element `` and includes several standard ASP.NET server controls within the zone. 伺服器控制項不會實作任何實際的功能。這些這裡只能用來說明如何類別功能套用到轉譯的區域。The server controls do not implement any actual functionality; they are used here only to illustrate how the class features apply to rendering zones. 請注意，這些伺服器控制項，但它們不是實際控制項，您可以每個自動換行 （由 ASP.NET) 與物件在執行階段，因此會有相同的功能控制項。Note that these server controls, though they are not actual controls, are each automatically wrapped (by ASP.NET) with a object at run time, so they will have the same functionality as controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/webpartchromecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/webpartchromevb.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是自訂來源區域和類別。The third part of the code example is the source for the custom zone and a class. 自訂區域類別的建構函式，在程式碼會檢查`MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu`屬性。In the constructor for the custom zone class, the code checks the `MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu` property. 如果值為`true`，動詞命令功能表中的每個呈現區域中的控制項。If the value is `true`, verbs are rendered in a menu for each of the controls in the zone. 這是正常的預設行為在 Web 組件控制項集合。This is the normal, default behavior in the Web Parts controls set. 如果`MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu`屬性值是`false`，預設值，這個自訂的區域中，動詞命令會分別轉譯為每個控制項的標題列中的連結。If the `MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu` property value is `false`, which is the default in this custom zone, the verbs are rendered individually as links in the title bar of each control. 請注意，在網頁中的程式碼的位置``宣告項目，所以在`RenderVerbsInMenu`屬性設為`true`，如此一來，動詞命令會出現在控制項上的功能表。Notice that in the Web page code where the `` element is declared, there is a `RenderVerbsInMenu` attribute set to `true`, so that the verbs will appear in menus on the controls. 若要試驗這項功能，您可以設定宣告式`RenderVerbsInMenu`屬性`false`，並記下指令動詞會轉譯為連結。To experiment with this feature, you can set the declarative `RenderVerbsInMenu` attribute to `false`, and note how the verbs are rendered as links. 自訂類別會覆寫在數種方法，轉譯和自訂的區域建立的執行個體`MyWebPartChrome`類別於其方法。The custom class overrides the rendering on several methods, and the custom zone creates an instance of the `MyWebPartChrome` class in its method. 這適用於自訂的轉譯頁面。This applies the custom rendering to the page. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#2)] 當您載入網頁瀏覽器中時，您所見的原始程式碼中的各種不同的樣式和其他轉譯自訂如何進行`MyWebPartChrome`類別出現在區域中呈現的控制項。When you load the Web page in a browser, you can see how the various stylistic and other rendering customizations made in the source code of the `MyWebPartChrome` class appear on the controls rendered in the zone.

para.span: 繼承自類別，當您想要覆寫的特定區段的預設轉譯或伺服器控制項。

span.span: Inherit from the class when you want to override the default rendering of certain sections of or server controls.

para.span: 您可以選擇覆寫方法，方法，並特別或方法，以自訂轉譯。

span.span: You can optionally override the method, the method, and especially the or methods, to customize the rendering.

para.span: 若要使用您的自訂類別控制項區域時，在開發自訂區域，衍生自類別，並覆寫其方法。

span.span: To use your custom class for the controls in a zone, develop a custom zone derived from the class, and override its method.

para.span: 如需詳細資訊，如何使用子系區域中的物件，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。

span.span: For details on how to use a child object in a zone, see the Example section.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase zone, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager manager) cil managed
Public Sub New (zone As WebPartZoneBase, manager As WebPartManager)

span.span: The associated control.

param.name: manager
param.span: 目前網頁上的 控制項。

span.span: The control on the current page.

summary.span: 初始化控制項的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化的新執行個體類別。The initializes a new instance of the class. 它主要供區域中其方法建立的執行個體處理 chrome 轉譯和任何自訂轉譯的物件區域中的控制項。It is used primarily by a zone in its method to create an instance of the object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for controls in the zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩件事。The following code example demonstrates two things. 首先，它會建立自訂類別的新執行個體`MyWebPartChrome`藉由覆寫中衍生方法稱為區域`MyZone`。First, it creates a new instance of the custom class `MyWebPartChrome` by overriding the method in a derived zone called `MyZone`. 第二個建構函式中`MyWebPartChrome`類別，它會指派建構函式的參數中的物件可以用在類別內的私用欄位。Second, in the constructor of the `MyWebPartChrome` class, it assigns the objects in the parameters of the constructor to private fields that can be used within the class. 此範例中因此可讓您存取相關聯的區域的方法和之前物件建構函式，即使在和均可存取屬性。This example thus gives you a way to access the associated zone and object even in the constructor, before the and properties are accessible. 最後，請注意，工作的建構函式，基底建構函式必須也叫用方法宣告的一部分。Finally, note that for the constructor to work, the base constructor must also be invoked as part of the method declaration. 下列程式碼包含兩個自訂類別。The following code contains the two custom classes. 要執行此範例所需的完整程式碼，包括網頁上裝載這些控制項，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#2)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style CreateWebPartChromeStyle (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType chromeType);

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style CreateWebPartChromeStyle(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType chromeType) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control that is currently being rendered.

param.name: chromeType
param.span: 特定控制項的 Chrome 型別，其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The type of chrome for a particular control; one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 建立樣式物件，該樣式物件為 物件呈現的每一個 控制項提供樣式屬性。

span.span: Creates the style object that supplies style attributes for each control rendered by the object.
A that contains style attributes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立物件，以供用以呈現物件控制項。The method creates a object that is used by the object to render a control. 預設的方法會建立為基礎的樣式屬性屬性值為中參考的控制項`webPart`參數。The default method creates style attributes based on the property value of the control referenced in the `webPart` parameter. 特殊情況發生時選取控制項。A special situation occurs when a control is selected. 若頁面位於頁面顯示模式可以選取控制項，而實際上已選取目前的控制項，預設值方法也會合併在控制項的樣式資訊的樣式資訊屬性。If the page is in a page display mode where controls can be selected, and the current control is actually selected, the default method also merges the style information of the control with the style information from the property. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例示範使用方法。This code example demonstrates use of the method. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下的節從程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 請注意，建立基底的方法，則樣式資訊會先擷取，並接著藉由變更所使用的字型會修改樣式資訊控制所呈現。Notice that it first retrieves the style information created by the base method, and then modifies the style information by changing the font used for the control being rendered. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#5)] 如果您載入網頁瀏覽器中，您可以看到字型用於控制項是所指定的覆寫方法。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can see that the font used in the controls is the one specified in the overridden method.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: is not one of the enumeration values.

para.span: 如果您繼承自類別，您可以選擇覆寫方法，而且您想要新增的基底方法，以自訂樣式的樣式資訊屬性的合併。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you can optionally override the method, and merge the style information from the base method with custom style attributes that you want to add.

para.span: 如需示範，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節中的程式碼。

span.span: For a demonstration, see the code in the Example section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性的值來決定屬性。The value of the property is determined by the value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection FilterWebPartVerbs(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection verbs, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: verbs
param.span: 所有動詞命令的集合，這些動詞命令與 webPart 參數中參考的控制項相關聯。

span.span: The collection of all verbs associated with the control referenced in the webPart parameter.

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 根據開發人員提供的準則，在呈現中排除指定動詞命令。

span.span: Excludes specific verbs from being rendered, based on criteria provided by a developer.

returns.span: ，包含與 相關聯的所有動詞命令。

span.span: A containing all verbs associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來自動篩選特定動詞命令的相關聯的動詞集合從控制項，並防止所呈現的已篩選的動詞命令。The method provides a way to automatically filter certain verbs from the collection of verbs associated with a control, and prevent the filtered verbs from being rendered.

span.span: The collection is .
\- or - is .

para.span: 如果您建立自訂類別，您可以選擇覆寫篩選出呈現特定動詞的方法。

span.span: If you create a custom class, you can optionally override the method to filter out specific verbs from being rendered.

para.span: 最常見的作法是建立簽入的指令動詞的私用方法集合控制，並決定是否應轉譯模每個動詞命令，根據您選擇的準則。

span.span: The most common way to do this is to create a private method that checks the verbs in the collection of a control and determines whether each verb should be rendered, based on criteria that you choose.

para.span: 請注意，基底方法提供了許多難以重現您完全覆寫方法; 如果預設篩選條件如果您只有少數的特殊情況下，您可能要先呼叫基底方法，然後將產生的集合傳遞您自己的其他方法來套用自訂篩選準則。

span.span: Note that the base method provides a lot of default filtering criteria that would be difficult to reproduce if you completely override the method; if you only have a few special cases, you might want to call the base method first, and then pass the resulting collection through your own additional method to apply your custom filtering criteria.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance string GetWebPartChromeClientID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 取得 Web 網頁中呈現的 物件用戶端識別碼。

span.span: Gets the client ID for the object as rendered in a Web page.

returns.span: 字串，包含 物件用戶端識別碼。

span.span: A string that contains the client ID for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取得的資料表，其中包含用戶端識別碼`webPart`遭到轉譯。The method gets the client ID of the table that contains the `webPart` being rendered. 資料表是轉譯的輸出會直接對應至物件，並套用樣式，並建立模組化的版面配置控制項當做容器。The table is the rendered output that corresponds directly to the object, and is used as a container to apply styles and create a modular layout for the control. 它很有用的用戶端識別碼用戶端指令碼的用途而言，如果您想要變更 chrome 中的項目，而不必張貼頁面回傳至伺服器的物件。It is useful to get the client ID of the object for client-side scripting purposes, if you want to change something in the chrome without having to post the page back to the server.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance string GetWebPartTitleClientID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 取得包含 控制項標題之表格儲存格的用戶端識別碼。

span.span: Gets the client ID for the table cell that contains the title for a control.

returns.span: 字串，包含 標題的用戶端識別碼。

span.span: A string that contains the client ID for the title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取包含標題的表格儲存格的用戶端識別碼值`webPart`遭到轉譯。The method retrieves the client ID value for the table cell that contains the title of the `webPart` being rendered. 重要的案例，其中方法用來取得用戶端識別碼的標題儲存格`webPart`適用於 Web 組件拖放功能。An important scenario in which the method is used to get the client ID of the title cell of the `webPart` is for the Web Parts drag-and-drop feature. 方法也很有用的其他用戶端指令碼的用途中。The method is also useful for other client-side scripting purposes. 例如，您無法變更標題或具有用戶端指令碼，而不必張貼頁面回傳至伺服器之儲存格樣式。For example, you could change the title or the style of the cell with client-side scripting, rather than having to post the page back to the server.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection GetWebPartVerbs(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 取得應使用 控制項呈現的動詞命令集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of verbs that should be rendered with a control.

returns.span: ，包含應使用 呈現的所有動詞命令。

span.span: A containing all the verbs that should be rendered with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一個機會讓開發人員覆寫方法，並在轉譯時，排除特定動詞命令。The method provides developers with an opportunity to override the method and exclude certain verbs from being rendered. 這是類似於方法，也可以排除呈現動詞命令。This is similar to the method, which also can exclude verbs from being rendered. 不過，方法並未包含廣泛的情況下，您要檢查某些準則，來決定是否要呈現動詞命令。However, the method is not meant for cases where you want to check some criteria to decide whether to render a verb. 相反地，這個方法時，您事先知道您一定想要排除某個動詞命令。Instead, this method is useful when you know in advance that you always want to exclude a certain verb. 例如，如果您開發自訂類別，您可能會決定您一定想要排除在關閉的動詞命令控制項，因此，使用者可永遠不會關閉的控制項。For example, if you develop a custom class, you might decide that you always want to exclude the close verb on controls, so that users can never close the controls. 而非設定屬性`false`上所有控制項，您可以只覆寫方法，並排除關閉任何呈現動詞命令呈現與您的自訂控制項物件。Rather than setting the property to `false` on all the controls, you can simply override the method and exclude close verbs from being rendered on any control rendered with your custom object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下的節從程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 覆寫的方法會使用基底的方法來擷取所有動詞命令，從`webPart`控制，然後逐一動詞命令的集合，將所有的指令動詞，除了關閉動詞命令，物件。The overridden method uses the base method to retrieve all verbs from the `webPart` control, then iterates through the verb collection, adding all verbs except the close verb to an object. 這會減少的動詞命令集接著會指派給新，傳回給呼叫者。This reduced set of verbs is then assigned to a new , which is returned to the caller. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#4)] 如果您載入網頁瀏覽器中，然後按一下動詞命令功能表 （標題列中的向下箭號顯示） 的每個控制項，您可以查看關閉的動詞命令不會呈現任何控制項。If you load the Web page in a browser and click the verbs menu (shown with a downward arrow in the title bar) of each control, you can see that the close verb is not rendered for any control.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PerformPreRender() cil managed

summary.span: 執行必須在呈現 控制項之前完成的工作。

span.span: Performs tasks that must be done prior to rendering controls.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RenderPartContents (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RenderPartContents(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

span.span: The that receives the webPart content.

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈現 控制項的主要內容區域，但不包括頁首和頁尾。

span.span: Renders the main content area of a control, excluding the header and footer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您覆寫的主體區域呈現`webPart`，同時保留為預設呈現轉譯的頁首和頁尾。The method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `webPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下的節從程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 覆寫的方法會執行兩件事自訂主體的轉譯控制項。The overridden method does two things to customize the rendering for the body of the control. 首先，它會檢查以判斷是否目前選取的控制項，而且如果是，寫入字串並不會呈現內容。First, it checks to determine whether the control is currently selected, and if so, writes out a string and does not render the contents. 第二，如果未選取控制項，而且控制項的區域的型別`MyZone`，呈現控制項。Second, if the control is not selected, and if the control's zone is of type `MyZone`, the method renders the control. 無法使用這個第二個核取，如果您想要確定自訂類別可以只能用來呈現中特定類型的控制項設計成包含的區域物件。This latter check could be used if you wanted to ensure that a custom class can be used only to render controls in a specific type of zone that is designed to contain the object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果您載入網頁瀏覽器中，您可以看到每個控制項的內容都會正常呈現。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can see that the content of each control is rendered normally. 如果您將網頁切換到設計模式中 (藉由選取**設計**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項)，將其中一個控制項拖曳到標示的空白區域**WebPartZone2**，因為控制項的內容會以不同的方式，呈現自訂不使用標準區域中的轉譯物件。If you switch the page into design mode (by selecting **Design** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control) and drag one of the controls into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, the contents of the control are rendered differently, because the custom object is not being used for the rendering in a standard zone. 這是相同的效果，如果您嘗試使用自訂，您會更類別以外的任何其他區域`MyZone`類別，因為前面的原始程式碼。This is the same effect that you would achieve if you tried to use the custom class with any other zone besides the `MyZone` class, due to the preceding source code.

span.span: You can optionally override the method.

para.span: 因此，只要執行任何轉譯自訂如果您想針對，然後呼叫其方法。

span.span: If so, you can simply perform whatever rendering customizations you want for , and then call its method.

para.span: 如果您也想依賴預設呈現在發生連線錯誤時，首先，呼叫基底方法，然後自訂從基底方法傳回。

span.span: If you also want to rely on the default rendering in the event of connection errors, call the base method first, and then customize the that is returned from the base method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void RenderWebPart (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RenderWebPart(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

span.span: The that receives the webPart content.

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈現完整的 控制項及其所有區段。

span.span: Renders a complete control with all its sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呈現完整控制項標頭、 內容和頁尾。The method renders the complete control, with header, contents, and footer. 覆寫此方法可讓開發人員完成以程式設計方式控制呈現的所有層面`webPart`，並基於這個原因，若要覆寫這個方法是相當複雜。Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `webPart`, and for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex. 中的其他方法與類別，開發人員可以覆寫，如果您覆寫這個方法，一般，而且很實用的方法是先呼叫基底方法，取得控制項，會傳回，而且自訂的某些屬性，而不處理的完整呈現自己。As with some other methods in the class that developers can override, if you override this method, a common and useful approach is to call the base method first, take the control that is returned, and customize some of its properties, rather than handling the complete rendering yourself.

span.span: The control that refers to is .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartManager As WebPartManager

summary.span: 取得目前 執行個體的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the current instance.

value.span: Web 網頁上目前 的參考。

span.span: A reference to the current on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供的參考至目前頁面上的執行個體。The property provides a reference to the current instance on the page. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例示範使用屬性。This code example demonstrates use of the property. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來判斷是否目前所呈現的控制項是選取的控制項，也就是說，在此範例頁面位於編輯檢視中，而且目前正在編輯控制項。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the current control being rendered is the selected control, which in this example means that the page is in edit view, and the control is currently being edited. 如果這些條件都成立，則不會呈現控制項的主體，並將字串寫入其所在位置。If these conditions are true, the body of the control is not rendered, and a string is written in its place. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果您載入網頁瀏覽器中，您可以選取網頁切換進入編輯模式**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下控制項，其中的動詞命令功能表中的編輯動詞命令在轉譯頁面時，不會呈現選取用於編輯控制項的主體。You can click the edit verb in the verbs menu of either of the controls; when the page is rendered, the body of the control selected for editing is not rendered. 不過，如果您將控制項拖曳至空白區標示為**WebPartZone2**，呈現控制項的主體。However, if you drag the control into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, the body of the control is rendered. 這是因為第二個區域是一種標準區域，而且不會使用自訂類別，在此範例中呈現控制項。This is because the second zone is a standard zone, and it does not use the custom class in this example to render the controls.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Zone As WebPartZoneBase

summary.span: 取得相關聯 區域的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the associated zone.

value.span: 與 相關聯之 的參考。

span.span: A reference to a that is associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供的參考其包含之控制項的區域物件所提供的轉譯。The property provides a reference to the zone that contains the controls for which the object provides rendering. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例示範使用屬性。This code example demonstrates use of the property. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來判斷是否與目前關聯區域物件是類型的區域`MyZone`。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the zone currently associated with the object is a zone of type `MyZone`. 如果是的話，會呈現控制項的內容。If so, the control's contents are rendered. 此程式碼可避免對自訂物件的工作是設計來建立它的執行個體之外的任何其他區域。This code would prevent the custom object from working with any other zone besides the one designed to create an instance of it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果您載入網頁瀏覽器中，每個控制項的內容都會正常呈現。If you load the Web page in a browser, the content of each control is rendered normally. 您也可以選取進入設計模式切換頁面**設計**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。You can switch the page into design mode by selecting **Design** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 如果您將拖曳其中一個控制項到標示的空白區域**WebPartZone2**，其內容會以不同的轉譯，因為自訂物件不會被用於轉譯。If you drag one of the controls into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, its contents are rendered differently, because the custom object is not being used for the rendering. 這是相同的效果，如果您嘗試使用自訂，您會更類別以外的任何其他區域`MyZone`類別，因為前面的原始程式碼。This is the same effect that you would achieve if you tried to use the custom class with any other zone besides the `MyZone` class, because of the preceding source code.
